name: Works Applications
body:
# Welcome to our pages
This GitHub organization is hosted to publish our codes to communicate with the world, maintained by the Shanghai office of [Works Applications](http://worksap.co.jp/).

## Visit also
- [our GitHub account](https://github.com/WorksApplications/)
- [GitHub account of Advanced Technology and Engineering division](https://github.com/worksap-ate/)
- [PARTAKE: web application to manage event organization](http://partake.in/) powered by Works Applications
- [our technical blog written in Japanese](http://dev.worksap.co.jp/)

## Are you a member of Works Applications?
To host your code by this organization, please contact our [account master](mailto:toda_k@worksap.co.jp).  
We will share our guideline to you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
